extractedText: MOHAMMED JUNAID ADIL  AI/ML Engineer  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY  Machine learning practitioner with hands-on experience in building, evaluating, and deploying  data-driven models, including deep learning and LLM-based systems. Experienced in retrieval-  augmented generation (RAG), computer vision, and NLP, with strong foundations in data  preprocessing, model evaluation, and cloud-based deployment.  +917730967996   mdjunaidadil@gmail.com   Hyderabad  EDUCATION  Master of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning  University College of Engineering, Osmania University | 2024-2026  PROJECTS  Built a GAN-augmented Intrusion Detection System (IDS) using the NSL-KDD dataset to address  class imbalance. Generated synthetic minority attack samples using Conditional GAN improving  recall and F1-score for rare intrusion classes. Evaluated model performance using ROC-AUC and  confusion-matrix analysis.  IDS-GAN | August 2025 - January 2026  SKILLS  Phone:   Email:   Location:  Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science  Muffakhamjah College of Engineering and Technology| 2020-2024  Developed a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system for legal question answering using  large language models (LLMs) and vector-based retrieval over Supreme Court case documents,  evaluated using RAGAS and BERTScore for answer relevance and faithfulness.  LawRAG | March 2025 - June 2025  Developed a speech emotion recognition system using Audio Spectrogram Transformer (AST)  and HuBERT models on the MODAL dataset. Implemented spectrogram-based preprocessing,  GPU-optimized training, dynamic learning rate scheduling, early stopping, and model  checkpointing. Achieved improved accuracy and robust generalization across emotion classes,  and prepared the training and inference pipeline for scalable deployment.  Speech Emotion Recognition | February 2025 - March 2025  https://www.propulsiontechjournal.com/index.php/journal/article/view/9711  Programming Languages: Python, SQL, C  Machine Learning: Supervised & Unsupervised Learning, Model Evaluation, Feature  Engineering  Deep Learning: CNN, RNN, LSTM, Transformers  NLP: Tokenization, Embeddings, Named Entity Recognition, RAG  Frameworks & Libraries: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, Hugging Face  Data Tools: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn  Databases: MySQL, Vector Databases (Chroma)  MLOps & Deployment: Docker, AWS SageMaker, FastAPI  Version Control: Git, GitHub
